verses.verse: To the chief <WH5329> Musician <WH5329> upon Jonathelemrechokim, <WH3128> Michtam <WH4387> of David, <WH1732> when the Philistines <WH6430> took <WH270> him in Gath. <WH1661> Be merciful <WH2603> to me, O God: <WH430> for man <WH582> would swallow <WH7602> me up; he fighting <WH3898> daily <WH3117> oppresses <WH3905> me.
My enemies <WH8324> would daily <WH3605> <WH3117> swallow <WH7602> me up: for they be many <WH7227> that fight <WH3898> against me, O you most <WH4791> High. <WH4791>
What time <WH3117> I am afraid, <WH3372> I will trust <WH982> in you.
In God <WH430> I will praise <WH1984> his word, <WH1697> in God <WH430> I have put my trust; <WH982> I will not fear <WH3372> what <WH4100> flesh <WH1320> can do <WH6213> to me.
Every <WH3605> day <WH3117> they wrest <WH6087> my words: <WH1697> all <WH3605> their thoughts <WH4284> are against <WH5921> me for evil. <WH7451>
They gather <WH1481> themselves together, <WH3162> they hide <WH6845> themselves, they mark <WH8104> my steps, <WH6119> when <WH834> they wait <WH6960> for my soul. <WH5315>
Shall they escape <WH6405> by iniquity? <WH205> in your anger <WH639> cast <WH3381> down the people, <WH5971> O God. <WH430>
You tell <WH5608> my wanderings: <WH5112> put <WH5414> you my tears <WH1832> into your bottle: <WH4997> are they not in your book? <WH5612>
When I cry <WH7121> to you, then <WH227> shall my enemies <WH341> turn <WH7725> back: <WH268> this <WH2088> I know; <WH3045> for God <WH430> is for me.
In God <WH430> will I praise <WH1984> his word: <WH1697> in the LORD <WH3068> will I praise <WH1984> his word. <WH1697>
In God <WH430> have I put my trust: <WH982> I will not be afraid <WH3372> what <WH4100> man <WH120> can do <WH6213> to me.
Your vows <WH5088> are on me, O God: <WH430> I will render <WH7999> praises <WH8426> to you.

For you have delivered <WH5337> my soul <WH5315> from death: <WH4194> will not you deliver <WH5337> my feet <WH7272> from falling, <WH1762> that I may walk <WH1980> before <WH6440> God <WH430> in the light <WH216> of the living? <WH2416>
